home.title: Mai Zazzage Bidiyo Mai Sauri Kyauta
home.subtitle: Zazzage bidiyo daga YouTube, Instagram, TikTok da sauransu

meta.title: Mai Zazzage Bidiyo Kyauta — YouTube, TikTok, Instagram | Inganci HD & 4K
meta.description: Zazzage bidiyo daga YouTube, TikTok, Instagram, Facebook, VK kyauta ba tare da rajista ba. Shorts, Reels, Stories a ingancin HD da 4K. Mai sauri, amintacce, babu alamomin ruwa.

about.title: Wani Sabis — Dukkan Dandamali
about.text1: Kana neman wata hanya mai amintacce don ajiye bidiyoyin da ka fi so? Kayan saukar da bidiyo na yanar gizo kyauta yana tallafawa shahararrun shafukan masaukin bidiyo da kafofin sada zumunta: YouTube, TikTok, Instagram, Facebook, VK, Vimeo, da sauran da dama. Ba a buƙatar girka wani manhaja — komai yana aiki kai tsaye a burauzarka.
about.text2: Ajiye bidiyo cikin ingancin da ya fi girma da ake da shi — daga 360p zuwa 4K Ultra HD. Bidiyon kiɗa, Shorts, Reels, Stories, darussa, ko vlogs — sabis ɗinmu yana sarrafa su duka. Zazzage bidiyo ba tare da alamomin ruwa ba a cikin ingancin asali.
about.text3: Kawai liƙa mahaɗin bidiyo, zaɓi tsarin da ingancin da kake so, sannan sauke. Da sauri, kyauta, kuma ba a san kai ba. Babu rajista, babu tattara bayanai, babu kuɗaɗen ɓoye.

fast.title: Da saurin ƙasa da wuta
fast.text: Uwar garkenmu da aka inganta suna sarrafa bidiyo cikin sauri sosai fiye da sauran ayyuka makamantan su. Ajiye lokacinka ta hanyar saukarwa mai saurin gaske.

safe.title: Amintacce da keɓaɓɓe
safe.text: Sirrin ku yana da muhimmanci. Ba mu tattara bayanan sirri ba, ba mu buƙatar rajista, kuma ba mu adana tarihin saukar da fayilolinku ba. Gaba ɗaya ba a san ku ba.

free.title: Kyauta gaba ɗaya
free.text: Duk fasaloli suna samuwa ba tare da biyan kuɗi, rajista, ko iyakoki da aka ɓoye ba. Zazzagewa marar iyaka, kyauta har abada.

platforms.title: Jerin Dandamali da ke Ƙaruwa
platforms.text: YouTube, Instagram, TikTok, Facebook, VK, Vimeo — kuma wannan farkon ne kawai. Muna ci gaba da ƙara tallafi ga sabbin dandamali.

noInstall.title: Babu girkawa
noInstall.text: Yana aiki kai tsaye a burauzarka a kowace na'ura. Babu buƙatar sauke manhajoji ko ƙarin abubuwa — kawai buɗe shafin kuma ka fara sauke fayiloli.

quality.title: Mafi inganci
quality.text: Zazzage bidiyo cikin ingancinsu na asali har zuwa 4K Ultra HD. Zaɓi daga tsaruka da dama: MP4, MP3, WebM. Ba a ƙara alamar ruwa ba.

form.supported: Dandamali da ake tallafawa: YouTube, TikTok, Instagram, Facebook, VK, Vimeo
form.vpnHint: Idan hanyar haɗin ba ta buɗe ba ko bidiyon bai yi aiki ba — gwada kashe VPN sannan ka danna "Ajiye fayil" sake

error.invalidUrl: Haɗin ba daidai ba. Don Allah ku sake gwadawa.
error.notFound: Ba a sami komai a wannan mahaɗin ba. Duba URL ɗin kuma ka sake gwadawa.
error.rateLimited: Buƙatu sun yi yawa. Ku sake gwadawa cikin {seconds} daƙiƙa.
error.tooManyRequests: Bukatun sun yi yawa. Don Allah a jira minti ɗaya.
error.serverError: Kuskuren sabar. Don Allah ku sake gwadawa daga baya.
error.network: Kuskuren haɗi. Duba intanet ɗinka ka sake gwadawa.
error.unknown: Wani abu ya tafi ba daidai ba. Don Allah ku sake gwadawa.

404.title: Ba a sami shafin ba
404.description: Shafin da kuke nema ba ya wanzu ko an motsa shi.

500.title: Kuskuren uwar garke
500.description: Wani abu ya yi kuskure. Da fatan za a sake gwadawa daga baya.

footer.description: Kayan aikin yanar gizo kyauta don sauke bidiyo daga shafuka mashahuri.
